item.title: Submit Community News
item.description: We have changed how community news is submitted. Please see below for details on how to submit Community News, Letters to the Editor and Business News.

item.title: New women's clothing store opens at UTC
item.description: The Mall at University Town Center recently announced the opening of Garage, a casual clothing store for young women who “embrace fun, confidence, and effortless style.”

item.title: 2025 Class 6A-11 Football Previews: Lakewood Ranch, Palmetto, Parrish Community
item.description: The Sarasota Herald-Tribune will get you ready for the 2025 high school football season. Here are previews for the teams competing in FHSAA District 6A-11.
